QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Twilight Highlands!
QuestData.Description: By order of his royal highness, King Anduin Wrynn, all able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to the throne room in Stormwind Keep.$B$BKing Wrynn requires a trustworthy and proven hero for a mission of the utmost importance.$B$BStormwind Keep can be found in the eastern portion of Stormwind City.$B$BAnyone willing may report to Grand Admiral Jes-Tereth for briefing. For the glory and honor of the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Grand Admiral Jes-Tereth at Stormwind Keep in Stormwind.
QuestData.RewardText: I am pleased that you have answered my summons, $c.
